line.text: As fast as thou shalt wane so fast thou grow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In one of thine from that which thou departest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And that fresh blood which youngly thou bestow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou mayst call thine when thou from youth convertest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Herein lives wisdom beauty and increase
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Without this folly age and cold decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If all were minded so the times should cease
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And threescore year would make the world away
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Let those whom nature hath not made for store
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Harsh featureless and rude barrenly perish
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Look whom she best endowed she gave thee more
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which bounteous gift thou shouldst in bounty cherish
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: She carved thee for her seal and meant thereby
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou shouldst print more not let that copy die
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
